verses.verse: וַיֹּסִ֙פוּ֙ <WH3254> again בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֵה֖וּד <WH164> when Ehud מֵֽת׃ <WH4191> was dead

וַיִּמְכְּרֵ֣ם <WH4376> sold יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD בְּיַד֙ <WH3027> them into the hand יָבִ֣ין <WH2985> of Jabin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who מָלַ֖ךְ <WH4427> that reigned בְּחָצ֑וֹר <WH2674> in Hazor וְשַׂר־ <WH8269> the captain צְבָאוֹ֙ <WH6635> of whose host סִֽיסְרָ֔א <WH5516> [was] Sisera וְה֥וּא <WH1931> he יוֹשֵׁ֖ב <WH3427> which dwelt בַּחֲרֹ֥שֶׁת <WH2800> in Harosheth הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> of the Gentiles

וַיִּצְעֲק֥וּ <WH6817> cried בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> unto the LORD כִּ֠י <WH3588> for תְּשַׁ֨ע <WH8672> for he had nine מֵא֤וֹת <WH3967> hundred רֶֽכֶב־ <WH7393> chariots בַּרְזֶל֙ <WH1270> of iron ל֔וֹ וְ֠הוּא <WH1931> and he לָחַ֞ץ <WH3905> oppressed אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּחָזְקָ֖ה <WH2394> he mightily עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> and twenty שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> years ס

וּדְבוֹרָה֙ <WH1683> And Deborah אִשָּׁ֣ה <WH802> the wife נְבִיאָ֔ה <WH5031> a prophetess אֵ֖שֶׁת <WH802> the wife לַפִּיד֑וֹת <WH3941> of Lapidoth הִ֛יא <WH1931> he שֹׁפְטָ֥ה <WH8199> she judged אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel בָּעֵ֥ת <WH6256> at that time הַהִֽיא׃ <WH1931> he

וְ֠הִיא <WH1931> he יוֹשֶׁ֨בֶת <WH3427> And she dwelt תַּֽחַת־ <WH8478> under תֹּ֜מֶר <WH8560> under the palm tree דְּבוֹרָ֗ה <WH1683> of Deborah בֵּ֧ין <WH996> between הָרָמָ֛ה <WH7414> between Ramah וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between בֵּֽית־ אֵ֖ל <WH1008> and Bethel בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> in mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> Ephraim וַיַּעֲל֥וּ <WH5927> came up אֵלֶ֛יהָ <WH413> and to בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לַמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <WH4941> to her for judgment

וַתִּשְׁלַ֗ח <WH7971> And she sent וַתִּקְרָא֙ <WH7121> and called לְבָרָ֣ק <WH1301> Barak בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲבִינֹ֔עַם <WH42> of Abinoam מִקֶּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6943> out of Kedeshnaphtali נַפְתָּלִ֑י <WH5321> of Naphtali וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> to him הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> Behold צִוָּ֣ה ׀ <WH6680> commanded יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto him Hath not the LORD אֱלֹהֵֽי־ <WH430> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵ֤ךְ <WH1980> Go וּמָֽשַׁכְתָּ֙ <WH4900> and draw בְּהַ֣ר <WH2022> toward mount תָּב֔וֹר <WH8396> Tabor וְלָקַחְתָּ֣ <WH3947> and take עִמְּךָ֗ <WH5973> you עֲשֶׂ֤רֶת <WH6235> with thee ten אֲלָפִים֙ <WH505> thousand אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> men מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children נַפְתָּלִ֖י <WH5321> of Naphtali וּמִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> and of the children זְבֻלֽוּן׃ <WH2074> of Zebulun

וּמָשַׁכְתִּ֨י <WH4900> And I will draw אֵלֶ֜יךָ <WH413> about אֶל־ <WH413> about נַ֣חַל <WH5158> unto thee to the river קִישׁ֗וֹן <WH7028> Kishon אֶת־ <WH853> סִֽיסְרָא֙ <WH5516> Sisera שַׂר־ <WH8269> the captain צְבָ֣א <WH6635> army יָבִ֔ין <WH2985> of Jabin's וְאֶת־ <WH853> רִכְבּ֖וֹ <WH7393> with his chariots וְאֶת־ <WH853> הֲמוֹנ֑וֹ <WH1995> and his multitude וּנְתַתִּ֖יהוּ <WH5414> and I will deliver בְּיָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> him into thine hand

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH413> then בָּרָ֔ק <WH1301> And Barak אִם־ <WH518> to her If תֵּלְכִ֥י <WH1980> with me then I will go עִמִּ֖י <WH5973> with וְהָלָ֑כְתִּי <WH1980> will go וְאִם־ <WH518> if לֹ֥א <WH3808> you will not תֵלְכִ֛י <WH1980> go עִמִּ֖י <WH5973> with לֹ֥א <WH3808> I will not אֵלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> go

וַתֹּ֜אמֶר <WH559> And she said הָלֹ֧ךְ <WH1980> I will surely אֵלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> that thou takest עִמָּ֗ךְ <WH5973> thee אֶ֚פֶס <WH657> with thee notwithstanding כִּי֩ <WH3588> for לֹ֨א <WH3808> not תִֽהְיֶ֜ה <WH1961> become תִּֽפְאַרְתְּךָ֗ <WH8597> shall not be for thine honour עַל־ <WH5921> on הַדֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <WH1870> the journey אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you are about הוֹלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> to take כִּ֣י <WH3588> into בְֽיַד־ <WH3027> into the hand אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> of a woman יִמְכֹּ֥ר <WH4376> shall sell יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> סִֽיסְרָ֑א <WH5516> Sisera וַתָּ֧קָם <WH6965> arose דְּבוֹרָ֛ה <WH1683> And Deborah וַתֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> and went עִם־ <WH5973> with בָּרָ֖ק <WH1301> with Barak קֶֽדְשָׁה׃ <WH6943> to Kedesh

וַיַּזְעֵ֨ק <WH2199> called בָּרָ֜ק <WH1301> And Barak אֶת־ <WH853> זְבוּלֻ֤ן <WH2074> Zebulun וְאֶת־ <WH853> נַפְתָּלִי֙ <WH5321> and Naphtali קֶ֔דְשָׁה <WH6943> to Kedesh וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> and he went up בְּרַגְלָ֔יו <WH7272> at his feet עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <WH6235> with ten אַלְפֵ֖י <WH505> thousand אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> men וַתַּ֥עַל <WH5927> went up עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> with דְּבוֹרָֽה׃ <WH1683> and Deborah

וְחֶ֤בֶר <WH2268> Now Heber הַקֵּינִי֙ <WH7017> the Kenite נִפְרָ֣ד <WH6504> had severed מִקַּ֔יִן <WH7017> himself from the Kenites מִבְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> [which was] of the children חֹבָ֖ב <WH2246> of Hobab חֹתֵ֣ן <WH2859> the father in law מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> of Moses וַיֵּ֣ט <WH5186> and pitched אָהֳל֔וֹ <WH168> his tent עַד־ <WH5704> far אֵל֥וֹן <WH436> unto the plain [בַּצְעַנִּים כ] (בְּצַעֲנַנִּ֖ים <WH6815> Zaannannim ק) אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אֶת־ <WH854> is near קֶֽדֶשׁ׃ <WH6943> which [is] by Kedesh

וַיַּגִּ֖דוּ <WH5046> And they shewed לְסִֽיסְרָ֑א <WH5516> Sisera כִּ֥י <WH3588> for עָלָ֛ה <WH5927> was gone up בָּרָ֥ק <WH1301> that Barak בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֲבִינֹ֖עַם <WH42> of Abinoam הַר־ <WH2022> to mount תָּבֽוֹר׃ <WH8396> Tabor ס

וַיַּזְעֵ֨ק <WH2199> gathered together סִֽיסְרָ֜א <WH5516> And Sisera אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all רִכְבּ֗וֹ <WH7393> all his chariots תְּשַׁ֤ע <WH8672> [even] nine מֵאוֹת֙ <WH3967> hundred רֶ֣כֶב <WH7393> chariots בַּרְזֶ֔ל <WH1270> of iron וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who אִתּ֑וֹ <WH854> from מֵחֲרֹ֥שֶׁת <WH2800> that [were] with him from Harosheth הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> of the Gentiles אֶל־ <WH413> to נַ֥חַל <WH5158> unto the river קִישֽׁוֹן׃ <WH7028> of Kishon

וַתֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said דְּבֹרָ֨ה <WH1683> And Deborah אֶל־ <WH413> to בָּרָ֜ק <WH1301> unto Barak ק֗וּם <WH6965> Up כִּ֣י <WH3588> For זֶ֤ה <WH2088> this הַיּוֹם֙ <WH3117> for this [is] the day אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> hath delivered יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> in which the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> סִֽיסְרָא֙ <WH5516> Sisera בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <WH3027> into thine hand הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> behold יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> is not the LORD יָצָ֣א <WH3318> gone out לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> before וַיֵּ֤רֶד <WH3381> went down בָּרָק֙ <WH1301> thee? So Barak מֵהַ֣ר <WH2022> from mount תָּב֔וֹר <WH8396> Tabor וַעֲשֶׂ֧רֶת <WH6235> and ten אֲלָפִ֛ים <WH505> thousand אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> men אַחֲרָֽיו׃ <WH310> after

וַיָּ֣הָם <WH2000> discomfited יְ֠הוָה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> סִֽיסְרָ֨א <WH5516> Sisera וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָרֶ֧כֶב <WH7393> and all [his] chariots וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֛ה <WH4264> and all [his] host לְפִי־ <WH6310> with the edge חֶ֖רֶב <WH2719> of the sword לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before בָרָ֑ק <WH1301> Barak וַיֵּ֧רֶד <WH3381> lighted down סִֽיסְרָ֛א <WH5516> so that Sisera מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> and הַמֶּרְכָּבָ֖ה <WH4818> off [his] chariot וַיָּ֥נָס <WH5127> and fled away בְּרַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> on his feet

וּבָרָ֗ק <WH1301> But Barak רָדַ֞ף <WH7291> pursued אַחֲרֵ֤י <WH310> after הָרֶ֙כֶב֙ <WH7393> the chariots וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> And הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> and after the host עַ֖ד <WH5704> far חֲרֹ֣שֶׁת <WH2800> unto Harosheth הַגּוֹיִ֑ם <WH1471> of the Gentiles וַיִּפֹּ֞ל <WH5307> fell כָּל־ <WH3605> and all מַחֲנֵ֤ה <WH4264> and all the host סִֽיסְרָא֙ <WH5516> of Sisera לְפִי־ <WH6310> upon the edge חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> of the sword לֹ֥א <WH3808> not נִשְׁאַ֖ר <WH7604> left עַד־ <WH5704> even אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> [and] there was not a man

וְסִֽיסְרָא֙ <WH5516> Howbeit Sisera נָ֣ס <WH5127> fled away בְּרַגְלָ֔יו <WH7272> on his feet אֶל־ <WH413> to אֹ֣הֶל <WH168> to the tent יָעֵ֔ל <WH3278> of Jael אֵ֖שֶׁת <WH802> the wife חֶ֣בֶר <WH2268> of Heber הַקֵּינִ֑י <WH7017> the Kenite כִּ֣י <WH3588> for שָׁל֗וֹם <WH7965> for [there was] peace בֵּ֚ין <WH996> between יָבִ֣ין <WH2985> between Jabin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king חָצ֔וֹר <WH2674> of Hazor וּבֵ֕ין <WH996> between בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> and the house חֶ֥בֶר <WH2268> of Heber הַקֵּינִֽי׃ <WH7017> the Kenite

וַתֵּצֵ֣א <WH3318> went out יָעֵל֮ <WH3278> And Jael לִקְרַ֣את <WH7125> to meet סִֽיסְרָא֒ <WH5516> Sisera וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him סוּרָ֧ה <WH5493> unto him Turn in אֲדֹנִ֛י <WH113> my lord סוּרָ֥ה <WH5493> turn in אֵלַ֖י <WH413> about אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֑א <WH3372> to me fear וַיָּ֤סַר <WH5493> not And when he had turned in אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH413> to her הָאֹ֔הֱלָה <WH168> unto her into the tent וַתְּכַסֵּ֖הוּ <WH3680> she covered בַּשְּׂמִיכָֽה׃ <WH8063> him with a mantle

וַיֹּ֧אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֵלֶ֛יהָ <WH413> about הַשְׁקִינִי־ <WH8248> to drink נָ֥א <WH4994> to her Please מְעַט־ <WH4592> unto her Give me I pray thee a little מַ֖יִם <WH4325> water כִּ֣י <WH3588> for צָמֵ֑אתִי <WH6770> for I am thirsty וַתִּפְתַּ֞ח <WH6605> And she opened אֶת־ <WH853> נֹ֧אוד <WH4997> a bottle הֶחָלָ֛ב <WH2461> of milk וַתַּשְׁקֵ֖הוּ <WH8248> and gave him drink וַתְּכַסֵּֽהוּ׃ <WH3680> and covered

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Again he said אֵלֶ֔יהָ <WH413> to her עֲמֹ֖ד <WH5975> unto her Stand in פֶּ֣תַח <WH6607> the door הָאֹ֑הֶל <WH168> of the tent וְהָיָה֩ <WH1961> become אִם־ <WH518> shall be if אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> and it shall be when any man יָב֜וֹא <WH935> doth come וּשְׁאֵלֵ֗ךְ <WH7592> and enquire וְאָמַ֛ר <WH559> of thee and say הֲיֵֽשׁ־ <WH3426> is there פֹּ֥ה <WH6311> here אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> any man וְאָמַ֥רְתְּ <WH559> and says אָֽיִן׃ <WH369> else

וַתִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> took יָעֵ֣ל <WH3278> Then Jael אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> wife חֶ֠בֶר <WH2268> Heber's אֶת־ <WH853> יְתַ֨ד <WH3489> a nail הָאֹ֜הֶל <WH168> of the tent וַתָּ֧שֶׂם <WH7760> and took אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּקֶּ֣בֶת <WH4718> an hammer בְּיָדָ֗הּ <WH3027> in her hand וַתָּב֤וֹא <WH935> and went אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> about בַּלָּ֔אט <WH3909> secretly וַתִּתְקַ֤ע <WH8628> unto him and smote אֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּתֵד֙ <WH3489> the nail בְּרַקָּת֔וֹ <WH7541> into his temples וַתִּצְנַ֖ח <WH6795> and fastened בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> it into the ground וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> he נִרְדָּ֥ם <WH7290> for he was fast asleep וַיָּ֖עַף <WH5774> and weary וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <WH4191> So he died

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> and behold בָרָק֮ <WH1301> And behold as Barak רֹדֵ֣ף <WH7291> pursued אֶת־ <WH853> סִֽיסְרָא֒ <WH5516> Sisera וַתֵּצֵ֤א <WH3318> came out יָעֵל֙ <WH3278> Jael לִקְרָאת֔וֹ <WH7125> to meet וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> him and said ל֔וֹ לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Come וְאַרְאֶ֔ךָּ <WH7200> and I will shew אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> thee the man אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you מְבַקֵּ֑שׁ <WH1245> whom thou seekest וַיָּבֹ֣א <WH935> And when he came אֵלֶ֔יהָ <WH413> her וְהִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> behold סִֽיסְרָא֙ <WH5516> into her [tent] behold Sisera נֹפֵ֣ל <WH5307> lay מֵ֔ת <WH4191> dead וְהַיָּתֵ֖ד <WH3489> and the nail בְּרַקָּתֽוֹ׃ <WH7541> [was] in his temples

וַיַּכְנַ֤ע <WH3665> subdued אֱלֹהִים֙ <WH430> So God בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> on that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he אֵ֖ת <WH853> יָבִ֣ין <WH2985> Jabin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַתֵּ֜לֶךְ <WH1980> pressed יַ֤ד <WH3027> And the hand בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel הָל֣וֹךְ <WH1980> heavier וְקָשָׁ֔ה <WH7186> and prevailed עַ֖ל <WH5921> upon יָבִ֣ין <WH2985> against Jabin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> of Canaan עַ֚ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> they הִכְרִ֔יתוּ <WH3772> until they had destroyed אֵ֖ת <WH853> יָבִ֥ין <WH2985> Jabin מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king כְּנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> of Canaan פ
